Name: Zap
Description: Deals 20  Light Magical Base Damage and burns the target for 1s, dealing 1  Fire Magical Base Damage.

Name: Light Orb
Description: Cast spheres of floating light that travels up to Infinite meters to brightly illuminate your surroundings for 40 seconds.

Name: Magic Lock
Description: Lockable objects such as doors or boxes will be locked for 10s.

Name: Slow
Description: Cause the target to suffer -40% Move Speed Bonus for 2s.

Name: Ignite
Description: Set the target's weapon on fire for 15s. While active, deal 5  Fire Magical Base Damage and burn enemies for 1  Fire Magical Base Damage over 1s on successful attacks.

Name: Ice Bolt
Description: Deal 30   Ice Magical Base Damage with 4 Impact Power and inflicts -20% Move Speed Bonus and -20% Action Speed for 1s.

Name: Magic Missile
Description: Channel for up to 3s () while remaining still and fire a homing missile every 0.3s () that each deal 11   Arcane Magical Base Damage with 2 Impact Power.

Name: Haste
Description: Grants the target 5% Move Speed Bonus, 10% Action Speed, 10% Spell Casting Speed for 8s.

Name: Lightning Strike
Description: When cast, a bolt of lightning falls in the targeted area after 0.5s, electrocuting enemies, dealing 30  Lightning Magical Base Damage in a 0.8m blast radius and inflicting -20% Move Speed Bonus for 1s.

Name: Invisibility
Description: Grants the target invisibility for 4s. While active, the target also gains 5% Move Speed Bonus.

Name: Fireball
Description: Shoot a burning fireball dealing 25   Fire Magical Base Damage with 6 Impact Power) to a direct hit target and 10  Fire Magical Base Damage as area of effect with 4 Impact Power while knocking back nearby targets. Additionally either one can burn the targets, dealing 3  Fire Magical Base Damage over 3s.

Name: Explosion
Description: When cast, places a mark on the targeted object within 8m or in the air if no object in range. The mark explodes after 3s dealing 25  Fire Magical Base Damage with 6 Impact Power to enemies within a 1m area and burns, dealing 3  Fire Magical Base Damage over 2s.

Name: Chain Lightning
Description: Electrocutes the target, dealing 30  Lightning Magical Base Damage, and fires another chain lightning that is transferred to a random target within 8m area up to 3 times. A bounced chain deals 25  Lightning Magical Base Damage / 25  Lightning Magical Base Damage / 20  Lightning Magical Base Damage depending on how many times it bounces. Additionally, targets hit by this shock will also suffer -20% Move Speed Bonus for 1s. It does not transfer to the target it was transferred to previously, and it transfers to the caster if you are nearby.

Name: Protection
Description: Target within 7m receives a 20 Physical Base Shield for 20s. Casts to self if no target is found.

Name: Bless
Description: Target within 7m gains 2 All Attributes for 30s. Casts to self if no target is found.

Name: Divine Strike
Description: Target within 7m gains 5 Divine Strike Damage for 20s. Casts to self if no target is found.

Name: Cleanse
Description: Removes all harmful magic and poison effects from target within 7m. Casts to self if no target is found.

Name: Lesser Heal
Description: Heals target within 7m for 15 Magical Base Healing. Casts to self if no target is found.

Name: Bind
Description: Binds target within 7m in place for 0.75s.

Name: Holy Strike
Description: Creates an AoE burst of light in a specified area within 7m that hits all targets within 1m (including friendly targets) after a 0.5s delay, dealing 20  Divine Magical Base Damage and disorienting their vision over 4s.

Name: Holy Light
Description: Heals target player within 7m for 25 Magical Base Healing - OR - Deals 100  Divine Magical Base Damage to target Undead Monster within the same range.

Name: Sanctuary
Description: Channel for up to 5s () while remaining still, creating a 3.5m AoE around the Cleric which pulses every 1s (), healing players for 5 Magical Base Healing and dealing 14  Divine Magical Base Damage to Undead Monsters with each pulse.

Name: Locust Swarm
Description: Channel a swarm of locusts in a target area within 7m for up to 6s () while remaining still, dealing 13  Divine Magical Base Damage per second in 0.1s ticks while also inflicting -50% Incoming Physical Healing Mod and -50% Incoming Magical Healing Mod, all in a 3m radius.

Name: Earthquake
Description: Channel an earthquake in a specified area within 7m for up to 6s () while remaining still, dealing 7  Earth Magical Base Damage to targets per step they move whilst causing them to suffer -50% Move Speed Bonus in a 2.5m radius.

Name: Resurrection
Description: Target a fallen ally to Channel while remaining still, reviving them after 20s (), but causing them to suffer -99% Percent Max Health Healing on revival.

Name: Rousing Rhythms
Description: Grant all allies within range 2 All Attributes for 30s/60s/120s.

Name: Din of Darkness
Description: After finishing the song, Channel for another 7.36s during which you deal 1/3/5  Dark Magical Base Damage per beat to all enemies/monsters within range.

Name: Beats of Alacrity
Description: Grant self 5/7/9 Move Speed Add for 60s/120s/240s.

Name: Allegro
Description: After playing, grant all allies within range 1 stack of the Allegro Buff every 1s up to 3 times, refreshing the duration each time. Max 3 stacks, each stack granting 3%/4.5%/6% Action Speed and 3%/4.5%/6% Spell Casting Speed for 8s.

Name: Accelerando
Description: After playing, grant all allies within range 1 stack of the Accelerando Buff every 1s up to 3 times, refreshing the duration each time. Max 3 stacks, each stack granting 1/3/5 Move Speed Add for 8s.

Name: Unchained Harmony
Description: Open all doors/containers within range, including locked containers but not locked doors.

Name: Shriek of Weakness
Description: Shriek into the ears of all enemies/monsters within range, causing them to suffer -3/-4/-5 Physical Power and -10/-20/-30 Armor Rating for 6s/12s/18s.

Name: Piercing Shrill
Description: Deal 15/20/25 Physical Base Damage to all enemies/monsters within range and inflict the echo sound effect on the affected target for 3s if the target is a player.

Name: Banshees Howl
Description: Cause all enemies/monsters (except Sub-boss and boss monsters) within range to suffer -1/-2/-3 All Attributes for 20s.

Name: Song of Silence
Description: Silence all enemies/monsters within range for 1s/1.5s/2s. See Silence page for more details.

Name: Peacemaking
Description: Channel for 5s, during which, all characters within range lose the ability to fight or use any attack related animation when enchanted. Monsters will still follow the performer.

Name: Lament of Languor
Description: Cause all enemies/monsters within range to suffer -10 Move Speed Add for 6s/12s/18s.

Name: Chaotic Discord
Description: Channel for 5s during which you excite all monsters (no effect on players) within range to attack the nearest target except the performer. Monsters deaths inflicted by other monsters are accredited to the Bard, at least for Adventure Points. If there is no other target other than the performer nearby, the monster will not attack but will still follow the performer.

Name: Aria of Alacrity
Description: Grants self 4%/6%/8% Action Speed for 60s/120s/240s.

Name: Tranquility
Description: Grants all allies within range the ability to restore 1 Recoverable Healing per second when resting for 10s/20s/30s.

Name: Song of Shadow
Description: Grants all allies within range invisibility for 10s/15s/20s. Invisibility appears to work like Hide except being bumped into will not break invisibility.

Name: Harmonic Shield
Description: Grants all allies within range 15 Armor Rating and 15 Magical Resistance for 30s/60s/120s.

Name: Chorale of Clarity
Description: Grants all allies within range the ability to restore 8 Spell Points every 2s when resting for 8s/16s/24s.

Name: Ballad of Courage
Description: Grants self 5/7/10 Physical Power for 60s/120s/240s.

Name: Power of Sacrifice
Description: Curse the target, dealing 3  Curse Magical Base Damage (0% Scaling) per second while granting them 15 Strength and 15 Vigor for 12s.

Name: Curse of Weakness
Description: Curse the target, causing them to suffer -25% All Attributes Bonus, as well as -15% Physical Damage Reduction Mod and -15% Magical Damage Reduction Mod for 12s.

Name: Bolt of Darkness
Description: Fires a bolt that deals 20  Dark Magical Base Damage (100% Scaling) to the target.

Name: Curse of Pain
Description: Curse the target, inflicting 15  Hybrid Magical Base Damage(50% Scaling) over 8s. Additionally, if the target was not already cursed, they instantly receive 15  Evil Magical Base Damage (75% Scaling).

Name: Bloodstained Blade
Description: Target gains 5 Physical Buff Weapon Damage for 20s. When the target swings their weapon, they take 3  Evil Magical Base Damage (0% Scaling). Self cast if no target is found.

Name: Spell Predation
Description: Consume all removable magical Buffs on the enemy and for each status removed, gain 1 Darkness Shard and deal 3  Evil Magical Base Damage 100% Scaling.

Name: Ray of Darkness
Description: Channel a dark beam for up to 5s (), dealing 12  Dark Magical Base Damage (100% Scaling) per second in .1s ticks to any target the beam touches. Moving and aiming are possible while channeling.

Name: Life Drain
Description: Channel for up to 7.5s (), dealing 5  Evil Magical Base Damage (25% Scaling) to the target per 1s (). Convert 100% of the damage dealt into health for the caster. If the channel would deal damage to a corpse, it will automatically cancel instead.

Name: Hellfire
Description: Create eternal hellfire and blasts it towards the target. Deals 60  Fire Magical Base Damage (50% Scaling) per second in 0.2s ticks with 12 Impact Power to any target within the area of effect. The hellfire does not dissipate when it reaches a target and can travel through walls.

Name: Flame Walker
Description: While active, gain the ability to leave a trail of Hellfire for 6s. Each step leaves a trails that lasts 4 seconds. Targets that enter the flame area will burn, taking 5  Fire Magical Base Damage (100% Scaling) per second in 0.2s ticks, per stack. (max 2 stacks)

Name: Eldritch Shield
Description: Grants the target a 25 Magical Base Shield (0% Scaling per 1s) for 15s. When the shield absorbs its maximum damage, gain 20%  Dark Power Bonus towards the next dark spell cast within 4s.

Name: Summon Hydra
Description: Summon a Hydra, which inhabits a 0.75m area, that spits fireballs dealing 10  Dark Magical Base Damage (100% Scaling) with 4 Impact Power to enemy targets for 10 seconds. The Hydra can also detects hidden targets.

Name: Nature's Touch
Description: Target receives 15 Recoverable Health and 15 Magical Base Healing over 12s.

Name: Barkskin Armor
Description: Grant self 25 Armor Rating for 10s.

Name: Dreamfire
Description: Deal 15  Spirit Magical Base Damage to enemies within a chosen 0.8m area after a 0.5s delay. Any allies or self currently affected by Nature's Touch that are within 7m of you are instantly healed for 10 Magical Base Healing per enemy target.

Name: Thorn Barrier
Description: Creates a 1.2m tall, 2m radius thorn barrier that lasts for 8 seconds. Any character touching the thorn barrier will take 4 Physical Base Damage (0% Scaling) per second.

Name: Entangling Vines
Description: Spreads roots across the floor in a 1m radius that last for 6s. Any targets that pass through the area are rooted in place for 1s. After the effect is removed, the target gets immunity to the entangling effects for 1 second. Can only have one on the field at once.

Name: Restore
Description: Allies within 3m of you including yourself are granted Restore, healing them for 30 Magical Base Healing over 10s.

Name: Summon Treant
Description: Summons a mobile Treant in a targeted area within 7m to fight for 12 seconds. Treants deal 35.2 damage with 4 Impact Power per hit and have Demolition.

Name: Tree of Life
Description: Sprout a tree of life onto a player within a cast range of 7m, granting 5 All Attributes, 40 Recoverable Health, and 15 Magical Base Healing over 10s.

Name: Mending Grove
Description: Create a forest area centered around you with a 3m radius. Targets that remain in the area gain 10% Max Health Bonus and are healed for 10 Magical Base Healing per second for 7s.

Name: Fire Arrow
Description: Fire a homing arrow every 0.2s () for 0.6s () in a radial pattern, each dealing 10   Fire Magical Base Damage (100% Scaling) with 4 Impact Power and inflicting Burn.

Name: Stone Skin
Description: Surround yourself with stone for 10s, gaining 10% Physical Damage Reduction and 5% Physical Power Bonus, but suffering -10 Move Speed Add.

Name: Water Bolt
Description: Launch a condensed water orb with a radius of 0.2m at 6m/s, dealing 20   Ice Magical Base Damage (100% Scaling) with 4 Impact Power to targets it touches and inflicting Wet for 2s.

Name: Windblast
Description: Deal 10  Air Magical Base Damage (100% Scaling) to a target within 7m and push them back 3m.

Name: Eruption
Description: Cause a ground explosion up to 7m away that is 0.8m wide, dealing 20  Earth Magical Base Damage (100% Scaling) with 4 Impact Power and lifting all targets within the area into the air 1000 over 0.75s.

Name: Flamestrike
Description: Create a fire pillar lasting 3.1s, dealing 35 (100%) Fire Damage on creation and 10  Fire Magical Base Damage (50% Scaling) with 6 Impact Power per second in 0.2s ticks to enemies inside while inflicting Burn.

Name: Glaciate
Description: Envelop your weapon in ice for 15s, inflicting Frostbite for 1s on hit.

Name: Ice Spear
Description: Fire an ice spear that travels 16.5m/s and pierces all targets along its path, dealing 30   Ice Magical Base Damage (100% Scaling) with 4 Impact Power.

Name: Fire Orb
Description: Launch a fire orb forward, dealing 5  Fire Magical Base Damage (50% Scaling) per second to nearby targets. The orb lasts for 6 seconds and deals 30   Fire Magical Base Damage (100% Scaling) with 12 Impact Power to targets it touches.

Name: Lightning Bolt
Description: Channel a lightning beam for 5s () while moving, Electrifying a target within 7m and dealing 5  Lightning Magical Base Damage (100% Scaling) per 0.1s ().

Name: Vortex
Description: Create a vortex centered on the caster. Targets touching the vortex take 15  Air Magical Base Damage (100% Scaling) and are pushed back.

Name: Levitation
Description: Instantly lift a target within 7m into the air over 1s and gently lower them back down over 3s.

Name: Lightning Sphere
Description: Surround yourself with an electromagnetic field for 6s, Electrifying all targets within 1.75m for 5  Lightning Magical Base Damage (50% Scaling) per second.

Name: Summon Earth Elemental
Description: Summon an Earth Elemental within a cast range of 7m that lasts 24s. The Earth Elemental has a radius of 0.75m, grants the caster 30 Armor Rating, and deals 40  Physical Base Damage (100% Scaling) to nearby enemies.
